message.name: ERR_AUDIT_PLAN_SEARCH_NO_CRITERIA
message.locale: At least one search criteria must be specified.

message.name: INF_AUDIT_PLAN_SEARCH_NO_MATCH
message.locale: No audit plan could be found which matched the search criteria.
